cat.lump.ir.retrievalmodels.document

Class Fragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.ir.retrievalmodels.document.Fragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Fragment
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A fragment of text with multiple representations including:
    • plain text
    • bag of words
    • character n-grams
    Since:
    17 Mar, 2014
    Version:
    0.1 *
    Author:
    albarron
    See Also:
